name: FanDriveMedia
overview:
FanDriveMedia is an mobile entertainment technology company. Their core products include a downloadable mobile application for live events, mobile messaging platform, direct connections into wireless carriers and services including providing mobile marketing service to professional sports teams and large media companies.

The company was founded by The Washington Nationals President, a part owner Stan Kasten, and marketing executive J.B.Vick

The company counts among its clients AEG and many NBA teams including the LA Lakers, LA Clippers, LA Galaxy , Detroit Pistons, DC Wizards, Cleveland Cavs, Atlanta Hawks and more; MLB teams Cleveland Indians and Washington Nationals; NHL teams Florida Panthers, Atlanta Thrashers and Washington Capitals.

The company also provides marketing services to Raycom media and some of the largest TV Station groups in the country.
